Package edu.bu.labs.rttt.agents

Class Agent

java.lang.Object
edu.bu.labs.rttt.agents.Agent
Direct Known Subclasses:
RandomAgent
public abstract class Agent extends Object
A class representing an arbitrary agent in recursive tic tac toe. An Agent has access to the @{link PlayerType} that this Agent is controlling. If this Agent is controlling the "x" player, then it will get to make the first move of the game, which requires two choices to be made instead of one. The method makeFirstMove is called in this situtation. Every other turn of the game the makeOtherMove method is called (since the location of the "inner" game to make a move on is known). After a game is complete, the method afterGameEnds is called.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • getMyPlayerType

      public final PlayerType getMyPlayerType()
      A getter method to get the PlayerType this Agent is controlling.
      Returns:
      The PlayerType this Agent is controlling.

    • makeFirstMove

      public abstract Pair<Coordinate,Coordinate> makeFirstMove(RecursiveTicTacToeGame.RecursiveTicTacToeGameView game)
      An abstract method that child classes must override. This method is called by the game logic on the first turn and the first turn only. If called, this Agent must choose the Coordinate of the "inner" game to make a move on, and the Coordinate of the square on that "inner" game to mark. These two Coordinates are returned as a Pair in that order.
      Parameters:
      game - The current state of the game.
      Returns:
      A Pair of Coordinates. The first Coordinate is the location of which "inner" game to make a move on while the second Coordinate is the location of the square on that "inner" game to mark.

    • makeOtherMove

      public abstract Coordinate makeOtherMove(RecursiveTicTacToeGame.RecursiveTicTacToeGameView game)
      A n abstract method that child classes must override. This method is called by the game logic for every turn in the game *except* the first one. When called, this Agent must choose the Coordinate of the square on an already-specified "inner" game to mark. The Coordinate this Agent chooses will be the Coordinate of the "inner" game their opponent will have to make their move on next.
      Parameters:
      game - The current state of the game.
      Returns:
      The Coordinate of the square on an already-specified "inner" game this Agent wants to mark.

    • afterGameEnds

      public abstract void afterGameEnds(RecursiveTicTacToeGame.RecursiveTicTacToeGameView game)
      An abstract method that child classes must override. This method is called after a game ends. This method is typically used to inspect the outcome of the game, compute summary statistics, etc.
      Parameters:
      game - The current state of the game.
